text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Hehe...
Naa-chan, did you like that flower?

Yeah...! The name "Bridal Veil" and
the small white flowers are super cute☆

Oh...
I wonder if the flower language is cute too?
Of course, it's hard not to be curious, right?

The flower language of the Bridal Veil is──
"Happiness", "Abundance", "Bride's Happiness"...

Bride's happiness...!
That's nice~ I really admire weddings~!
Oh, wait...!?
But Chiyuki-san and Tenka-chan aren't like that?

Ah... no, they're very lovely too.
Like the dresses and tiaras.

Yeah yeah!
I think Chiyuki-san would be super lovely as a bride!

Thank you.
But I wonder...?

Could I really be one?
And do I even want to be one...?
I might not be cut out for marriage after all.

Eh~!
Really...!?

What about you, Tenka-chan?
Don't you think marriage is wonderful~?

Not really...
Never really, thought... about it...

...Amana,
used to think that being a bride was everyone's dream...

...But I guess I'd be a little happy too.
If Tenka-chan got married first, Amana would be sad.

...Naa-chan,
Are you going to get married...?

Eh, I wonder...?
I don't know for now, but...
Someday... will you?

Someday...
Uh, yeah... Someday...?
...I see...

Oh... no, it's not that!
If Naa-chan is happy then...!

But... without Naa-chan...
Tenka...

Well then,
should I make Tenka-chan happy...?

If you'd like, please become my bride
Let's stay together forever from now on?

Eh, wait wait wait...! Then Amana will
also make Tenka-chan and Chiyuki-san brides too!
Naa-chan...!
Hehe, then the three of us────?

Sorry to keep you waiting
It's about time to go back.

Are the three of you ready...
──Can i come in?
Ah, we're almost ready but...
N-No, you can't...!
It's almost time for the wedding...!
